summary: Seems like Geralt's eyes aren't all that unique. Skyrim's own Nords, now with Witcher eyes of every color included in the game (only better)!
descriptionHtml:
-MY FIRST MOD. PLEASE DON'T KILL ME-

The Witcher saga brought to us "Geralt of Rivia". One thing everybody remembers about him? [color=#ffff00]His golden eyes.[color=rgb(255, 255, 255)] [color=#f4f4f4]After I downloaded this one mod, [/color][/color][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11933/?]Geralt Eyes[/url], I loved it. I never even dared use other eyes. I then searched the Internet like a crazy lady (though I am a dude, but the point stands)ï»¿, to find an image of the eye time after, which I was able to use. (YAY!) I then decided "My first Skyrim mod will be Geralt's Eyes, in every color that Skyrim has to offer (green, blue, ice blue, brown...)!". Only I should say, right now: [color=#ff0000]No red Vampire Witcher eyes[/color]. [color=#38761D]Nor Argonian[/color],[color=#BF9000] or Khajit[/color], [color=#45818e]or Elf[/color]. Basically, only for humans as of now. Maybe my heart will grow 5 sizes one day and give all of you non-human creatures of the Divines Witcher eyes as well, but for now, I stand by what I got.
author: TwoSyxxtySeven
